name: David JOHNSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, et al., Appellees

parties: David JOHNSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 1997, the direct appeal is dismissed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
693 A.2d 583
David JOHNSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, et al., Appellees.
